8550ee35-6f3f-46d2-ae2c-5cdf88f13457.name: Diffuse
8550ee35-6f3f-46d2-ae2c-5cdf88f13457.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

d4ec8258-1447-4ade-99c0-c7a1503765fb.name: Homogenous
d4ec8258-1447-4ade-99c0-c7a1503765fb.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

71d2440e-7a49-4bbe-a8e4-57d6c95429c0.name: No Blood
71d2440e-7a49-4bbe-a8e4-57d6c95429c0.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

9e62df25-bc32-4898-b057-2a93b32290d2.name: No Brain
9e62df25-bc32-4898-b057-2a93b32290d2.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

83350073-1ec6-48a1-afef-6c555f5d2abd.name: No Eyes
83350073-1ec6-48a1-afef-6c555f5d2abd.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

2c85dba1-19dc-4b30-9159-8fab50b53ab8.name: No Head
2c85dba1-19dc-4b30-9159-8fab50b53ab8.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

f2bf5cb1-a813-43c6-8d3e-6f82835530b8.name: No Neck
f2bf5cb1-a813-43c6-8d3e-6f82835530b8.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

57fb16bc-5121-4737-8673-3769c63e63e8.name: No Vitals
57fb16bc-5121-4737-8673-3769c63e63e8.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

9dba096e-beac-499e-b0aa-0ccaf6e793f2.name: Unliving
9dba096e-beac-499e-b0aa-0ccaf6e793f2.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
